newspaper.name: Newsletter (2023)
newspaper.description: After almost five years, The Luzonian is thrilled to announce the availability of our print releases. Look back on the stories of 2023 and claim your newsletter (June to August) at The Luzonian's office located in the OSAS Building starting on Feb. 12.

newspaper.name: Tabloid (2019)
newspaper.description: Tabloid (September-October 2019) is a special edition that features the stories of the university's students, faculty, and alumni, as well as the events and activities that took place during the said period.

magazine.name: Envergan Magazine (2024)
magazine.description: As we explore the contents of this year’s Envergan magazine, let us pause and contemplate our voyage. Last year, Manuel S. Enverga University Foundation’s 76th year centered around transcending excellence. Now, entering our 77th year, we are venturing beyond borders– a journey of excellence towards fostering ASEAN harmony. In honoring our founder’s legacy, we haven’t simply relied on past achievements. Instead, we have continued to make significant progress, experiencing growth, and achieving global competitiveness across all facets. This milestone not only marks an accomplishment for our institution but also stands as evidence of the collaborative efforts of every student, employee, faculty, and stakeholder. As students, we hold a crucial role in commemorating this achievement. Beyond being mere learners, we serve as ambassadors for the greater good and the advancement of our institution. Let us seize this opportunity to contribute to the enduring legacy of excellence as we progress forward.

magazine.name: Fiestanglaw (2023)
magazine.description: The Luzonian presents its highly anticipated 2023 Special Flash Issue, honoring the lively Fiestanglaw Year 13 celebration. This annual edition embodies our publication's essence of cultural richness and community spirit in celebrating the Christmas season.

magazine.name: Envergan Magazine (2022)
magazine.description: The 75th Foundation Magazine is a special edition that commemorates the 75th founding anniversary of Manuel S. Enverga University Foundation. This magazine features the university's history, achievements, and milestones, as well as the stories of its students, faculty, and alumni.
